nl.weeaboo.vn.core

Interface IUpdateable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    IAnalytics, IAnimatedRenderable, IBitmapTweenRenderer, IButtonRenderer, IContextManager, ICrossFadeRenderer, IImageModule, IModule, INinePatchRenderer, INovel, IOffscreenRenderTaskBuffer, IPlayTimer, IRenderable, ISaveModule, IScreen, IScreenTextState, ISoundController, ISoundModule, IStatsModule, ISystemModule, ITextModule, ITextRenderer, ITextureRenderer, IVideoModule

    public interface IUpdateable
    Interface for objects that require a periodic tick function.
